page.title: 11Employment in Twyford Area
page.content: The main centre of employment in the area is the{London Brick Company}at Calvert (3 miles away) and farming in and around the villages.Also to be found but employing fewer people are the more traditional jobs such as coal merchants,grain-mill,a nursing home,Public Houses,chimney sweep, garage,small builders,local authority and public service workers. Many people travel away each day for work to Bicester,Buckingham,Aylesbury, Milton Keynes and even London.To do so,they have to rely mainly on their own transport or use local bus services,where available.A few of the larger firms provide transport to the area. At present unemployment is low although some is expected at the Brickworks in the near future.
